member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:BudgieDock.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:BudgieDock.My.Resources.Resources.DefaultSettings
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to ;; For booleans, False=0, True=1 [Main] size=40 pos=Bottom animateScale=5 dockOpacity=10 dockCornerRadius=0 dockRed=255 dockGreen=255 dockBlue=255 separatorRed=0 separatorGreen=0 separatorBlue=0 autoHide=0 topMost=0 paddingTop=0 currentIconThemePath= isAppRuningRed=255 isAppRuningGreen=255 isAppRuningBlue=255 applyDockColorAtIsAppRuning=0 useDockAsTaskbar=0.

member.name: T:BudgieDock.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.summary: Returns the application object for the running application

member.name: P:BudgieDock.My.MyWpfExtension.Computer
member.summary: Returns information about the host computer.

member.name: P:BudgieDock.My.MyWpfExtension.User
member.summary: Returns information for the current user. If you wish to run the application with the current Windows user credentials, call My.User.InitializeWithWindowsUser().

member.name: P:BudgieDock.My.MyWpfExtension.Log
member.summary: Returns the application log. The listeners can be configured by the application's configuration file.
